Container.Name: fika_dediclient
Container.Overview: dedicated client to handle AI and other compute-intensive tasks for better framerates on non-dedicated clients.
Container.Requires: did you set permissions to 1000:1000 to FIKA client folder on the host? is the dedicated client pointing to the server's IP address, and not docker hostname or loopback?

Config.Name: FIKA Dedicated Client Folder
Config.Description: Path to host folder containing dedicated client files. Permissions should be 1000:1000.

Config.Name: Vanilla EFT Client Folder
Config.Description: Path to Vanilla EFT Client files. May not be needed.

Config.Name: Dedicated Client Profile ID
Config.Description: Generated by server on first-run after configuring for dedicated client.

Config.Name: Client UDP Port
Config.Description: Other players will connect to the dedicated client on this port.
